document_data.name: Aihonen
document_data.mainbody: '''Aihonen''' was a great hero who killed the [[white dragon]] [[Icasaracht]].
document_data.Description: When in battle, Aihonen used his [[sword]] the [[Blade of Aihonen]] and equipped a [[shield]] which bore the symbol of [[Tempus]].
document_data.Relationships: Over the years, Aihonen fought with the [[Uthgardt]] [[barbarian]] tribes of the [[Northwest Faer√ªn|North]]. During this time, the sea spirit [[Elisia]] fell in love with him.

History.Death: During the battle, Aihonen fell before the might of Icasaracht, but with his dying breath, he pierce her heart with the Blade of Aihonen.
